name: Blood pressure measured
description: Blood pressure is measured very carefully and accurate information is given.

name: Blood sugar Measured
description: Blood sugar is measured very carefully and accurate information is given.

name: weight Measured
description: Height and weight are accurately measured on digital machines.

name: Selling medicine on prescription

name: Diagnosing and giving medicine
description: A pharmacist diagnoses the disease by looking at the patient's symptoms and prescribes the necessary medicines.

name: Foreign medicine available

description: All types of local and foreign medicines are available at Well Pharma.
